TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConvertEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來格式化和 unformat 透過資料繫結的 Windows Form 控制項所顯示的值物件。The is used to format and unformat values displayed by a Windows Forms control that is bound to data through a object. 事件發生於控制項屬性繫結至值和繫結的值變更時，就會發生事件。The event occurs whenever a control property is bound to a value and the event occurs whenever the bound value changes. 和事件可讓您建立自訂的格式來顯示資料。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果資料表中的資料型別的，您可以指定資料應該顯示在本機的貨幣格式為--，藉由設定屬性中的格式化值事件。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can specify that the data should be displayed in the local currency format--by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此，您必須 unformat 中顯示的值事件。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，將兩者的委派和事件，並使用屬性，即可加入至的控制項。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and uses the property to add the to the of a control. `DecimalToCurrencyString`事件的委派，它會加入事件，會使用方法，以設定繫結的值的格式 (型別) 為貨幣。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the event, uses the method to format the bound value (a type) as currency. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`事件的委派，它會加入事件，將控制項所顯示的值轉換回型別。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您檢查之屬性的值轉換成的型別。The property enables you to check the type of the property that the value is being converted to. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷是否可以繼續到另一種類型的轉換。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the conversion of one type to another can proceed. `DecimalToCurrencyString`方法會測試是否是一個字串。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` method tests whether the is a string. 如果沒有，程式碼結束方法。If not, the code exits the method. 同樣地，`CurrencyStringToDecimal`方法會測試是否是，如果它不是則結束`true`。Similarly, the `CurrencyStringToDecimal` method tests whether the is a , and exits if it is not `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所包含的值屬性取決於所在事件會傳回。The value contained by the property depends on the event in which the is returned. 可以傳回的其中一個事件或事件。The can be returned in either the event or the event. 當都會傳入事件，屬性包含資料來源的未格式化的屬性值。When the is returned in the event, the property contains the unformatted property value of the data source. 內事件，您可以讀取屬性值、 格式化的值，並重設藉此將資料繫結控制項中顯示的值設定為新值 （格式化） 的屬性。Within the event, you can read the property value, format the value, and reset the property to the new (formatted) value, thereby setting the value displayed in the data-bound control. 當中傳回事件，此屬性會包含資料繫結控制項的自訂格式化值。When the is returned in the event, the property contains the custom-formatted value of the data-bound control. 內事件，您必須閱讀格式化的值、 加以剖析，並將它轉換回資料來源相同的資料類型。Within the event, you must read the formatted value, parse it, and convert it back to the same data type as the data source. 您接著可以重設未格式化的屬性值，並藉此設定資料來源的值。You can then reset the property to the unformatted value, and thereby set the value of the data source. 若要判斷資料來源的類型，請檢查屬性值。To determine the type of the data source, examine the property value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，將兩者的委派和事件，並使用屬性，即可加入至的控制項。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and uses the property to add the to the of a control. `DecimalToCurrencyString`事件的委派，它會加入事件，會使用方法，以設定繫結的值的格式 (型別) 為貨幣。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the event, uses the method to format the bound value (a type) as currency. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`事件的委派，它會加入事件，將控制項所顯示的值轉換回型別。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
